question: since there is an autoimmune link between type I and hypothyroid problems, would it be possible to be at risk for type I diabetes if you are hypothyroid?    I was diagnosed as hypothyroid in 1983, and developed type I diabetes in 2002.  There was never a test for thyroid antibodies done until recently I had a Thyroid peroxidase antibodies indicating 225IU/ML-ten times the normal range. This would indicate (to me, and I could be wrong) that I have Autoimmune Thyroid disease, and have had for 25+ years.  Could this have lead to me getting type I?
title: Hypothyroid and Type I diabetes
